title.rendered: Aqualis ASA : Notice of Annual General Meeting 2015

content.rendered:
29 April 2015 – The annual general meeting of Aqualis ASA will be held on 22 May 2015 at 13:00 CET at Sjølyst Plass 2, 0278 Oslo, Norway.

The formal notice for the Annual General Meeting has been sent to all shareholders registered in the Norwegian Central Security Depository (VPS).

Please click here for registration and documentation.
